abilitycapsule.name: Ability Capsule
abilitycapsule.effect: A capsule that allows a Pokémon with two Abilities to switch between these Abilities when it is used.

abilitypatch.name: Ability Patch
abilitypatch.effect: Changes a Pokémon's ability to its Hidden Ability.

abilityshield.name: Ability Shield
abilityshield.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This cute and rather unique-looking shield protects the holder from having its Ability changed by others.

abilityurge.name: Ability Urge
abilityurge.effect: When used, it activates the Ability of an ally Pokémon.

abomasite.name: Abomasite
abomasite.effect: Enables Abomasnow to Mega Evolve during battle.

absolite.name: Absolite
absolite.effect: Enables Absol to Mega Evolve during battle.

absorbbulb.name: Absorb Bulb
absorbbulb.effect: A consumable bulb. If the holder is hit by a Water-type move, its Sp. Atk will rise.

academyball.name: Academy Ball
academyball.effect: The academy’s standard-issue ball in a regulation size. Lots of students believe that if you kick it right on the academy emblem, it’ll fly in a straight line.

academybottle.name: Academy Bottle
academybottle.effect: A bottle emblazoned with the academy’s emblem. It’s light, sturdy, and vacuum insulated, so it’ll keep your hots hot and your colds cold.

academycup.name: Academy Cup
academycup.effect: The academy’s standard-issue cup for picnicking. The careful design of its mouth makes it popular both inside and outside the academy.

academytablecloth.name: Academy Tablecloth
academytablecloth.effect: The academy’s standard-issue tablecloth. It’s made with the latest fiber-processing technology and is so tough that not even a Razor Claw can tear it.

adamantmint.name: Adamant Mint
adamantmint.effect: Changes the Pokémon's stats to match the Adamant nature.

adamantorb.name: Adamant Orb
adamantorb.effect: Increases the power of Dragon- and Steel-type moves when held by Dialga.

adrenalineorb.name: Adrenaline Orb
adrenalineorb.effect: Using it makes wild Pokémon more likely to call for help. If held by a Pokémon, it boosts Speed when intimidated. It can be used only once.

aerodactylite.name: Aerodactylite
aerodactylite.effect: Enables Aerodactyl to Mega Evolve during battle.

aggronite.name: Aggronite
aggronite.effect: Enables Aggron to Mega Evolve during battle.

aguavberry.name: Aguav Berry
aguavberry.effect: Restores HP if it's low, but may cause confusion.

airballoon.name: Air Balloon
airballoon.effect: When held by a Pokémon, the Pokémon will float into the air. When the holder is attacked, this item will burst.

alakazite.name: Alakazite
alakazite.effect: Enables Alakazam to Mega Evolve during battle.

alomomolamucus.name: Alomomola Mucus
alomomolamucus.effect: Material obtained after defeating/catching Alomomola, used in TM crafting.

aloraichiumz.name: Aloraichium Z
aloraichiumz.effect: Allows Alolan Raichu to upgrade Thunderbolt to a Z-Move, Stoked Sparksurfer.

altarianite.name: Altarianite
altarianite.effect: Enables Altaria to Mega Evolve during battle.

ampharosite.name: Ampharosite
ampharosite.effect: Enables Ampharos to Mega Evolve during battle.

apicotberry.name: Apicot Berry
apicotberry.effect: Raises Special Defense when HP is low.

apple.name: Apple
apple.effect: This very sweet ingredient is sliced thin to make it easy to add into a sandwich.

applinjuice.name: Applin Juice
applinjuice.effect: Material obtained after defeating/catching Applin, used in TM crafting.

apricorn.name: Apricorn
apricorn.effect: A fruit whose shell can be used to form the capsules of all manner of Poké Balls when crafting them from scratch.

armorfossil.name: Armor Fossil
armorfossil.effect: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that lived on the land. It appears to be part of a collar.

arrokudascales.name: Arrokuda Scales
arrokudascales.effect: Material obtained after defeating/catching Arrokuda, used in TM crafting.

aspearberry.name: Aspear Berry
aspearberry.effect: If held by a Pokémon, it defrosts it.

assaultvest.name: Assault Vest
assaultvest.effect: Raises Special Defense but prevents the use of status moves.

audinite.name: Audinite
audinite.effect: Enables Audino to Mega Evolve during battle.

auxevasion.name: Aux Evasion
auxevasion.effect: Makes moves less likely to strike a Pokémon during a battle.

auxguard.name: Aux Guard
auxguard.effect: Sharply boosts the defensive stats of a Pokémon during a battle.

auxpower.name: Aux Power
auxpower.effect: Sharply boosts the offensive stats of a Pokémon during a battle.

auxpowerguard.name: Aux Powerguard
auxpowerguard.effect: Sharply boosts the offensive and defensive stats of a Pokémon during a battle.

avocado.name: Avocado
avocado.effect: An ingredient with sweet notes—though its flavor is very mild. The avocado’s richness, however, makes it satisfying to eat.

axewscales.name: Axew Scales
axewscales.effect: Material obtained after defeating/catching Axew, used in TM crafting.

azurillfur.name: Azurill Fur
azurillfur.effect: Material obtained after defeating/catching Azurill, used in TM crafting.

b&wgrasstablecloth.name: B&W Grass Tablecloth
b&wgrasstablecloth.effect: A tablecloth with a fun, trendy black-and-white design featuring Pokémon that seem poised to leap from the tall grass at any moment.

babiriberry.name: Babiri Berry
babiriberry.effect: Weakens a supereffective Steel-type attack against the holding Pokémon.

bach'sfoodtin.name: Bach's Food Tin
bach'sfoodtin.effect: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. The tinned food that Bach sells is curiously popular in Galar.

bacon.name: Bacon
bacon.effect: This very salty ingredient has been cooked just shy of charred, making it burst with fragrance and tasty flavor.

bagonscales.name: Bagon Scales
bagonscales.effect: Material obtained after defeating/catching Bagon, used in TM crafting.

baguette.name: Baguette
baguette.effect: A long loaf sliced into top and bottom halves. Its aroma of wheat and its straightforward, salty flavor make it pair well with all kinds of sandwich ingredients.

balmmushroom.name: Balm Mushroom
balmmushroom.effect: A rare mushroom which gives off a nice fragrance. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

banana.name: Banana
banana.effect: A very sweet ingredient. This go-to fruit is sweet and rich, and it’s beloved by many Pokémon.

banettite.name: Banettite
banettite.effect: Enables Banette to Mega Evolve during battle.

barboachslime.name: Barboach Slime
barboachslime.effect: Material obtained after defeating/catching Barboach, used in TM crafting.

barredcup.name: Barred Cup
barredcup.effect: A cup that’s as good for using at home as on a picnic. It’s light, sturdy, and stacks well, so it’s a cinch to pack up and carry around.

basculinfang.name: Basculin Fang
basculinfang.effect: Material obtained after defeating/catching Basculin, used in TM crafting.

basil.name: Basil
basil.effect: A very bitter ingredient that’s quite versatile, as herbs go. It’s fragrant and goes well with tomatoes.

battletablecloth.name: Battle Tablecloth
battletablecloth.effect: A garish, eye-catching tablecloth. Putting this on your picnic table will inspire any person or Pokémon who eats there to do their best.

beachglass.name: Beach Glass
beachglass.effect: A piece of colored glass. Waves have rounded its edges. It's slightly rough to the touch.

beastball.name: Beast Ball
beastball.effect: A special Poké Ball designed to catch Ultra Beasts. It has a low success rate for catching others.

beedrillite.name: Beedrillite
beedrillite.effect: Enables Beedrill to Mega Evolve during battle.

belueberry.name: Belue Berry
belueberry.effect: A Berry which is very rare in the Unova region. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

bergmiteice.name: Bergmite Ice
bergmiteice.effect: Material obtained after defeating/catching Bergmite, used in TM crafting.

berrysweet.name: Berry Sweet
berrysweet.effect: Evolves Milcery into Blueberry Flavor Alcremie.

bigbambooshoot.name: Big Bamboo Shoot
bigbambooshoot.effect: A large and rare bamboo shoot. It’s extremely popular with a certain class of gourmands.

bigmushroom.name: Big Mushroom
bigmushroom.effect: A large and rare mushroom. It is sought after by collectors.

bignugget.name: Big Nugget
bignugget.effect: A big nugget of pure gold that gives off a lustrous gleam. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

bigpearl.name: Big Pearl
bigpearl.effect: A quite-large pearl that sparkles in a pretty silver color. It can be sold at a high price to shops.

bigroot.name: Big Root
bigroot.effect: Recovers more HP from HP-stealing moves.

bindingband.name: Binding Band
bindingband.effect: A band that increases the power of binding moves when held.

bitterherbamystica.name: Bitter Herba Mystica
bitterherbamystica.effect: A legendary condiment with a deeply bitter taste. It’s said to dramatically bolster a body’s immune defenses, though that hasn’t been proven.

blackapricorn.name: Black Apricorn
blackapricorn.effect: A black Apricorn It has an indescribable scent.

blackaugurite.name: Black Augurite
blackaugurite.effect: A glassy black stone that produces a sharp cutting edge when split. It’s loved by a certain Pokémon.

blackbelt.name: Black Belt
blackbelt.effect: Increases the power of Fighting-type moves.

blackflute.name: Black Flute
blackflute.effect: A toy flute made from black glass. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

blackglasses.name: Black Glasses
blackglasses.effect: Increases the power of Dark-type moves.

blacksludge.name: Black Sludge
blacksludge.effect: A held item that gradually restores the HP of Poison-type Pokémon. It inflicts damage on all other types.

blastoisinite.name: Blastoisinite
blastoisinite.effect: Enables Blastoise to Mega Evolve during battle.

blazikenite.name: Blazikenite
blazikenite.effect: Enables Blaziken to Mega Evolve during battle.

blueapricorn.name: Blue Apricorn
blueapricorn.effect: A blue Apricorn. It smells a bit like grass.

bluebottle.name: Blue Bottle
bluebottle.effect: A go-to bottle widely used for drinks at picnics. Its simple design and portability make it popular among all sorts of people.

bluecup.name: Blue Cup
bluecup.effect: A cup sold with the Blue Bottle. The two don’t stack, so they’re tough to pack—but they look good, so they’re popular with those who like to post picnic photos.

bluedish.name: Blue Dish
bluedish.effect: A dish for picnics. Comes in plenty of colors to choose from based on the food or the mood. The blue variety is a consistent strong seller.

blueflute.name: Blue Flute
blueflute.effect: A toy flute made from blue glass. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

bluepok\u00e9ballpick.name: Blue Poké Ball Pick
bluepok\u00e9ballpick.effect: A sandwich pick with a simple blue Poké Ball design. Often used by Trainers who picked a Water-type Pokémon for their first partner.

bluescarf.name: Blue Scarf
bluescarf.effect: Raises holder's Beauty aspect in a Contest.

blueshard.name: Blue Shard
blueshard.effect: A small blue shard. It appears to be from some sort of implement made long ago.

bluetablecloth.name: Blue Tablecloth
bluetablecloth.effect: A simple blue tablecloth. It’s smooth and pleasant to the touch, and dishes can be placed on it with hardly a sound.

blue-flagpick.name: Blue-Flag Pick
blue-flagpick.effect: This pick flies a blue flag that lends an air of adventure. The flag itself is made of card stock, so it’ll fly proudly even with no wind.

blue-skyflowerpick.name: Blue-Sky Flower Pick
blue-skyflowerpick.effect: A flower pick designed to evoke a blue sky. It’s part of a line of “sky-flower” picks. Using a few is guaranteed to boost that special picnic spirit.

blukberry.name: Bluk Berry
blukberry.effect: A Berry which is very rare in the Unova region. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

blunderpolicy.name: Blunder Policy
blunderpolicy.effect: Raises Speed sharply if its attack misses.

bob'sfoodtin.name: Bob's Food Tin
bob'sfoodtin.effect: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. The tinned food that Bob sells is curiously popular in Galar.

boiledegg.name: Boiled Egg
boiledegg.effect: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. Even just one boiled egg can really enhance a dish.

boldmint.name: Bold Mint
boldmint.effect: Changes the Pokémon's stats to match the Bold nature.

bombirdierfeather.name: Bombirdier Feather
bombirdierfeather.effect: Material obtained after defeating/catching Bombirdier, used in TM crafting.

bonslytears.name: Bonsly Tears
bonslytears.effect: Material obtained after defeating/catching Bonsly, used in TM crafting.

boosterenergy.name: Booster Energy
boosterenergy.effect: An item to be held by Pokémon with certain Abilities. The energy that fills this capsule boosts the strength of the Pokémon.

bottlecap.name: Bottle Cap
bottlecap.effect: Maximizes one IV stat in Hyper Training.

bounsweetsweat.name: Bounsweet Sweat
bounsweetsweat.effect: Material obtained after defeating/catching Bounsweet, used in TM crafting.

bramblintwig.name: Bramblin Twig
bramblintwig.effect: Material obtained after defeating/catching Bramblin, used in TM crafting.

bravemint.name: Brave Mint
bravemint.effect: Changes the Pokémon's stats to match the Brave nature.

bread.name: Bread
bread.effect: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. An indispensable tool for mopping up that extra curry left on your plate.

brittlebones.name: Brittle Bones
brittlebones.effect: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. The taste boiled off from the bones is sure to give a dish a light umami taste.

bronzebottle.name: Bronze Bottle
bronzebottle.effect: A popular option among hikers. It’s made with titanium, so it doesn’t rust even if it’s used to hold drinks with high sodium content.

bronzecup.name: Bronze Cup
bronzecup.effect: A popular option among hikers. It’s made with titanium, so it doesn’t rust even if it’s used to hold drinks with high sodium content.

bronzorfragment.name: Bronzor Fragment
bronzorfragment.effect: Material obtained after defeating/catching Bronzor, used in TM crafting.

bruxishtooth.name: Bruxish Tooth
bruxishtooth.effect: Material obtained after defeating/catching Bruxish, used in TM crafting.

buggem.name: Bug Gem
buggem.effect: Increases the power of a Bug-type move only once.

bugmemory.name: Bug Memory
bugmemory.effect: Changes Silvally and its move Multi-Attack to Bug type.

bugterashard.name: Bug Tera Shard
bugterashard.effect: Changes a Pokémon's Tera Type to Bug.

buginiumz.name: Buginium Z
buginiumz.effect: Allows the use of Savage Spin-Out, the Bug type Z-Move.

buizelfur.name: Buizel Fur
buizelfur.effect: Material obtained after defeating/catching Buizel, used in TM crafting.

burndrive.name: Burn Drive
burndrive.effect: Changes Techno Blast to a Fire-type move when held by Genesect.

burnheal.name: Burn Heal
burnheal.effect: Cures a Pokémon of a burn.

butter.name: Butter
butter.effect: A condiment that unites salty and sweet and also packs a richness that makes bread a delight to eat. The finest butter products are made of 100 percent Moomoo Milk.

cacneaneedle.name: Cacnea Needle
cacneaneedle.effect: Material obtained after defeating/catching Cacnea, used in TM crafting.

calmmint.name: Calm Mint
calmmint.effect: Changes the Pokémon's stats to match the Calm nature.

cameruptite.name: Cameruptite
cameruptite.effect: Enables Camerupt to Mega Evolve during battle.

capsakidseed.name: Capsakid Seed
capsakidseed.effect: Material obtained after defeating/catching Capsakid, used in TM crafting.

carefulmint.name: Careful Mint
carefulmint.effect: Changes the Pokémon's stats to match the Careful nature.

carrotseeds.name: Carrot Seeds
carrotseeds.effect: Seeds to plant in a field. The kind of carrot you’ll get is determined by which field you plant the seeds in.

cellbattery.name: Cell Battery
cellbattery.effect: A consumable battery. If the holder is hit by an Electric-type move, its Attack will rise.

cetoddlegrease.name: Cetoddle Grease
cetoddlegrease.effect: Material obtained after defeating/catching Cetoddle, used in TM crafting.

chalkystone.name: Chalky Stone
chalkystone.effect: A small whitish stone picked up at the edge of the road.

charcadetsoot.name: Charcadet Soot
charcadetsoot.effect: Material obtained after defeating/catching Charcadet, used in TM crafting.

charcoal.name: Charcoal
charcoal.effect: Increases the power of Fire-type moves.

charizarditex.name: Charizardite X
charizarditex.effect: Enables Charizard to Mega Evolve during battle.

charizarditey.name: Charizardite Y
charizarditey.effect: Enables Charizard to Mega Evolve during battle.

chartiberry.name: Charti Berry
chartiberry.effect: Weakens a supereffective Rock-type attack against the holding Pokémon.

cheese.name: Cheese
cheese.effect: A very salty ingredient. This thinly sliced cheese is perfect for adding to a sandwich.

cheriberry.name: Cheri Berry
cheriberry.effect: If held by a Pokémon, it recovers from paralysis.

cherishball.name: Cherish Ball
cherishball.effect: Rre Poké Ball used for event Pokémon.

cherrytomatoes.name: Cherry Tomatoes
cherrytomatoes.effect: A very tart ingredient. Some varieties are also very sweet, and these are prized above all others by the people of Paldea.

chestoberry.name: Chesto Berry
chestoberry.effect: If held by a Pokémon, it recovers from sleep.

chewtleclaw.name: Chewtle Claw
chewtleclaw.effect: Material obtained after defeating/catching Chewtle, used in TM crafting.

chilanberry.name: Chilan Berry
chilanberry.effect: Weakens a Normal-type attack against the Pokémon holding this berry.

chilisauce.name: Chili Sauce
chilisauce.effect: A condiment with a very spicy kick. It’s thanks to Scovillain that this sauce gets its signature mouth-tingling burn.

chilldrive.name: Chill Drive
chilldrive.effect: Changes Techno Blast to an Ice-type move when held by Genesect.

choiceband.name: Choice Band
choiceband.effect: Raises Attack, but only one move can be used.

choicescarf.name: Choice Scarf
choicescarf.effect: Raises Speed, but only one move can be used.

choicespecs.name: Choice Specs
choicespecs.effect: Raises Special Attack, but only one move can be used.

chopleberry.name: Chople Berry
chopleberry.effect: Weakens a supereffective Fighting-type attack against the holding Pokémon.

chorizo.name: Chorizo
chorizo.effect: A very salty and spicy ingredient. This type of sausage has particularly robust salty flavor, and the spicier varieties are extra popular.

clauncherclaw.name: Clauncher Claw
clauncherclaw.effect: Material obtained after defeating/catching Clauncher, used in TM crafting.

clawfossil.name: Claw Fossil
clawfossil.effect: A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that lived in the sea. It appears to be part of a claw.

cleansetag.name: Cleanse Tag
cleansetag.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It helps keep wild Pokémon away if the holder is the first one in the party.

clearamulet.name: Clear Amulet
clearamulet.effect: An item to be held by a Pokémon. This clear, sparkling amulet protects the holder from having its stats lowered by moves used against it or by other Pokémon’s Abilities.

cloversweet.name: Clover Sweet
cloversweet.effect: Evolves Milcery into Clover Flavor Alcremie.

cobaberry.name: Coba Berry
cobaberry.effect: Weakens a supereffective Flying-type attack against the holding Pokémon.

coconutmilk.name: Coconut Milk
coconutmilk.effect: One of the many ingredients that can be used for cooking at your camp. The refined sweetness of this coconut milk makes it quite popular.

colburberry.name: Colbur Berry
colburberry.effect: Weakens a supereffective Dark-type attack against the holding Pokémon.

combeehoney.name: Combee Honey
combeehoney.effect: Material obtained after defeating/catching Combee, used in TM crafting.

cometshard.name: Comet Shard
cometshard.effect: A shard which fell to the ground when a comet approached. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

cornnberry.name: Cornn Berry
cornnberry.effect: A Berry which is very rare in the Unova region. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

couragecandy.name: Courage Candy
couragecandy.effect: Increases a Pokémon's Special Defense stat by 1.

couragecandyl.name: Courage Candy L
couragecandyl.effect: Increases a Pokémon's Special Defense stat.

couragecandyxl.name: Courage Candy XL
couragecandyxl.effect: Increases a Pokémon's Special Defense stat.

coverfossil.name: Cover Fossil
coverfossil.effect: A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that lived in the sea in ancient times. It appears to be part of its back.

covertcloak.name: Covert Cloak
covertcloak.effect: Conceals the holder, protecting it from the additional effects of moves.

crabrawlershell.name: Crabrawler Shell
crabrawlershell.effect: Material obtained after defeating/catching Crabrawler, used in TM crafting.

creamcheese.name: Cream Cheese
creamcheese.effect: A condiment offering very sweet and very tart flavor. It goes well with more ingredients than you’d expect, making it a convenient go-to.

croagunkpoison.name: Croagunk Poison
croagunkpoison.effect: Material obtained after defeating/catching Croagunk, used in TM crafting.

cryogonalice.name: Cryogonal Ice
cryogonalice.effect: Material obtained after defeating/catching Cryogonal, used in TM crafting.

cubchoofur.name: Cubchoo Fur
cubchoofur.effect: Material obtained after defeating/catching Cubchoo, used in TM crafting.

cucumber.name: Cucumber
cucumber.effect: A tart and bitter ingredient. Using it together with rich-tasting ingredients in a sandwich will really make the most of a cucumber’s fresh-veggie aroma.

cufanttarnish.name: Cufant Tarnish
cufanttarnish.effect: Material obtained after defeating/catching Cufant, used in TM crafting.

currypowder.name: Curry Powder
currypowder.effect: A very spicy condiment. Just watch out—use too much of this potent seasoning, and it’ll cancel out the other flavors.

custapberry.name: Custap Berry
custapberry.effect: Holder can move first when HP is low.

cyberball.name: Cyber Ball
cyberball.effect: A ball themed after hardcore gaming PCs. It may not light up like its inspiration, but it still stands out.

cyclizarscales.name: Cyclizar Scales
cyclizarscales.effect: Material obtained after defeating/catching Cyclizar, used in TM crafting.

dampmulch.name: Damp Mulch
dampmulch.effect: A fertilizer to be spread on soft soil in regions where Berries are grown. A maniac will buy it for a high price.

damprock.name: Damp Rock
damprock.effect: A Pokémon held item that extends the duration of the move Rain Dance used by the holder.

darkgem.name: Dark Gem
darkgem.effect: Increases the power of a Dark-type move only once.

darkmemory.name: Dark Memory
darkmemory.effect: Changes Silvally and its move Multi-Attack to Dark type.

darkterashard.name: Dark Tera Shard
darkterashard.effect: Changes a Pokémon's Tera Type to Dark.

darkiniumz.name: Darkinium Z
darkiniumz.effect: Allows the use of Black Hole Eclipse, the Dark type Z-Move.

decidiumz.name: Decidium Z
decidiumz.effect: Allows Decidueye to upgrade Spirit Shackle to a Z-Move, Sinister Arrow Raid.

dedennefur.name: Dedenne Fur
dedennefur.effect: Material obtained after defeating/catching Dedenne, used in TM crafting.

deepseascale.name: Deep Sea Scale
deepseascale.effect: Increases Special Defense when held by Clamperl. Evolves Clamperl when traded holding the item.

deepseatooth.name: Deep Sea Tooth
deepseatooth.effect: Increases Special Attack when held by Clamperl. Evolves Clamperl when traded holding the item.

deerlinghair.name: Deerling Hair
deerlinghair.effect: Material obtained after defeating/catching Deerling, used in TM crafting.

deinoscales.name: Deino Scales
deinoscales.effect: Material obtained after defeating/catching Deino, used in TM crafting.

delibirdparcel.name: Delibird Parcel
delibirdparcel.effect: Material obtained after defeating/catching Delibird, used in TM crafting.

destinyknot.name: Destiny Knot
destinyknot.effect: A long, thin, bright-red string to be held by a Pokémon. If the holder becomes infatuated, the foe does too.

diamondbottle.name: Diamond Bottle
diamondbottle.effect: A diamond-patterned bottle that’s small, light, and even comes with a cup. The detachable strap makes it handy for walking around with.

diamondpatterncup.name: Diamond Pattern Cup
diamondpatterncup.effect: A cup that’s as good for using at home as on a picnic. It’s light, sturdy, and stacks well, so it’s a cinch to pack up and carry around.

diamondtablecloth.name: Diamond Tablecloth
diamondtablecloth.effect: A tablecloth with a fashionable diamond pattern. It’s great at repelling water and mold, and stains and smudges wipe right off.

diancite.name: Diancite
diancite.effect: Enables Diancie to Mega Evolve during battle.

diggerdrill.name: Digger Drill
diggerdrill.effect: A single-use drill to bore a hole in the wall for your Secret Base.

diglettdirt.name: Diglett Dirt
diglettdirt.effect: Material obtained after defeating/catching Diglett, used in TM crafting.

direhit.name: Dire Hit
direhit.effect: Raises critical-hit ratio of a Pokémon in battle.

direhit2.name: Dire Hit 2
direhit2.effect: Raises a Pokémon's critical-hit ratio in battle.

direhit3.name: Dire Hit 3
direhit3.effect: Greatly raises a Pokémon's critical-hit ratio in battle.

discountcoupon.name: Discount Coupon
discountcoupon.effect: This special coupon allows you to buy items at a discount when you are shopping at a boutique.

discoveryslate.name: Discovery Slate
discoveryslate.effect: A slate overflowing with enigmatic energy. You can feel a strong connection between it and the Discovery Room at Ramanas Park.

distortionslate.name: Distortion Slate
distortionslate.effect: A slate overflowing with enigmatic energy. You can feel a strong connection between it and the Distortion Room at Ramanas Park.

dittogoo.name: Ditto Goo
dittogoo.effect: Material obtained after defeating/catching Ditto, used in TM crafting.

diveball.name: Dive Ball
diveball.effect: Catches Pokémon that live in water with 3.5x the rate of a standard Poké Ball.

dnasplicers.name: DNA Splicers
dnasplicers.effect: A splicer that fuses Kyurem and a certain Pokémon. They are said to have been one in the beginning.

domefossil.name: Dome Fossil
domefossil.effect: A fossil of an ancient Pokémon that lived in the sea. It appears to be part of a shell.

dondozowhisker.name: Dondozo Whisker
dondozowhisker.effect: Material obtained after defeating/catching Dondozo, used in TM crafting.

dousedrive.name: Douse Drive
dousedrive.effect: Changes Techno Blast to a Water-type move when held by Genesect.

dracoplate.name: Draco Plate
dracoplate.effect: Increases power of Dragon-type moves. Changes Arceus' type to Dragon.

dragonfang.name: Dragon Fang
dragonfang.effect: Increases the power of Dragon-type moves.

dragongem.name: Dragon Gem
dragongem.effect: Increases the power of a Dragon-type move only once.

dragonmemory.name: Dragon Memory
dragonmemory.effect: Changes Silvally and its move Multi-Attack to Dragon type.

dragonscale.name: Dragon Scale
